Description: Gene that the resource is related to
Assay(s) associated with the data (BAO IDs)
Data file format(s) - MS, txt, HDF5, etc.
Link to external data repository containing key dataset metadata
Data endpoint format (log2 expression, fold change, etc.)
Physical entity/method to calculate endpoint - fluorescence intensity, mass spec, etc.
Date when the data was publicly released (to the external repository)
Repository where the data has been released (e.g. GEO, dbGaP, PubChem, Synapse, etc.)
Identifier as registered by a repository (e.g. GEO ID, PubChem AID, Synpase ID, etc.)
